moves.13... Bf5 14. Qf3 c5 15. Rf4: He continues here with "Black's light-squared bishop couldn't defend that square so it blocked the g-file with ...Bg6."

moves.26... Qf7 27. Rg5: ! White's 26th and 27th moves set up a crushing sacrifice on h5.  For instance, 27...Rh8 28.Rgxh5! gxh5 29.Rxh5+ Kg7 30.Rg5+ Kf6 31.Qe5+ Ke7 32.Rg7.
